name: Cookie Christmas
description:
Very short game takes roughly 15 seconds - 1 hr to complete depending on skill level. The name, concept, level design, music, sound effects, art and mechanics were all decided by Eleanor who is 5 (Dad helped a little with programming). Game is designed to spread holiday cheer. Some sprites used from free available online sprite packs.

Made as part of the Yogscast Jingle  Game Jam :)
